dmca.title: Cease and Desist - URGENT
dmca.body:
(i have placed the attachment to this email is here: http://orthodoxanarchist.com/downloads/schewitz.pdf -- d.s.)


TO MATZAT WEBSITE ADMINISTRATOR:

Attached is a Cease and Desist letter sent to your attention regarding unauthorized use of a protected trademark, MANISCHEWITZ, by Mazeltovcocktail.Com, a website you support.

Please read the attached carefully or convey it to your legal counsel as soon as possible.  This is an extremely urgent matter, involving possible claims of infringement and misappropriation of intellectual property against your company.

If you have any questions, please contact us at the telephone number
indicated.

Sincerely,

Frank S. Kalamajka

BAKER AND RANNELLS, PA
ATTORNEYS AT LAW
626 North Thompson Street
Raritan, NJ  08869
Telephone: (908) 722-5640
Facsimile: (908) 725-7088
E-mail: fsk@br-tmlaw.com

www.tmlawworldwide.com

This email is confidential and may be legally privileged.  If you
received it in error please notify us immediately.  If you are not the
intended recipient you should not copy it, disclose its contents to
others, or use it for any purpose.


	
Frank S. Kalamajka, Esq. <fsk@br-tmlaw.com>
Attorney
Baker and Rannells, P.A.



(i have placed the attachment to this email is here: http://orthodoxanarchist.com/downloads/schewitz.pdf -- d.s.)
